headline: Account Executive at Solink
summary: Experienced Sales Development Representative with a demonstrated history of working in the information technology and services industry. Skilled in Customer Service, Sales, Bilingualism, Business Development, and Process Flow Documentation. Strong sales professional with a Social Sciences focused in Criminology from University of Ottawa.
